data.prayer: Jesus, you are the great high priest, please make the 1,978,404 believers in Huangnan Tibetan, Qinghai, China a worthy priesthood under you.
data.verse: Since then we have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus, the Son of God, let us hold fast our confession.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Huangnan Tibetan, Qinghai, China
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, convict the 1,978,404 believers in Huangnan Tibetan to be holy and righteous. Inspire them to gather in small groups for accountability and spiritual growth.
Father, for all those you call to look after your flock from the 1,978,404 believers in Huangnan Tibetan, please, make them passionate about hearing your Word.
data.verse: Therefore, you shepherds, hear the word of the LORD.

data.prayer: Spirit, help the 1,978,404 believers find a person of peace today among the 24,100,895 lost neighbors around them. And help them start discovery bible studies in these unbelieving homes.
data.verse: Suddenly a man in shining clothes stood before me and said, ‘Cornelius, God has heard your prayer and remembered your gifts to the poor. Send to Joppa for Simon who is called Peter. He is a guest in the home of Simon the tanner, who lives by the sea.’ So I sent for you immediately, and it was good of you to come. Now we are all here in the presence of God to listen to everything the Lord has commanded you to tell us.”

data.prayer: Lord, bring the blind by a way that they don’t know. Lead the Amdo, Hbrogpa people in paths that they don’t know. Make darkness light before them and crooked places straight. Do not forsake the Amdo, Hbrogpa people.
Lord, let it be said of the 24,100,895 lost in Huangnan Tibetan that you have called them out of darkness into your glorious light.
data.verse: But you are a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for God’s own possession, that you may proclaim the excellence of him who called you out of darkness into his marvelous light

data.prayer: Jesus, make yourself known to the 26,079,300 people living in Huangnan Tibetan through the internet today.
data.verse: They have no speech, they use no words; no sound is heard from them. Yet their voice goes out into all the earth, their words to the ends of the world. In the heavens God has pitched a tent for the sun.

data.section_summary:
the county of Huangnan Tibetan, Qinghai, China has a population of 26,079,300.

We estimate Huangnan Tibetan has 1,978,404 people who might know Jesus, 421,308 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 23,679,587 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 13 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, we pray for every movement leader and disciple in the county of Huangnan Tibetan, Qinghai, China that they would have deepening intimacy with you.
data.verse: On that day you will realize that I am in my Father, and you are in me, and I am in you.
